message.body:
People! JUGBABY opens tomorrow night! C. Kennedy + Upholstery + dj SnkPak
@ the Arts Parlor [broad & federal] CORRECTION: doors at 6:30, show STARTS at 7 PayWhatYouCan
Love, Uph
Weird question: how creepy or abundant are the puppets in the show?? My gf is kinda nervous cuz apparanlty shes freaked out by scary dolls and whatnot...
Um, they are mainly more sexually-offensive than creepy...
I sincerely hope yr gf had other plans... :/...?
No probs. Hehe she was a pussy pants. Sorry didnt get to say goodbye when leavin. U were m.i.a
Well, well, all I can do is THANK YOU IMMENSELY for coming!!!
